summary: I/O errors writing to PFS from within Slurm jobs

updates.details: Issue reported where I/O errors occur when writing to PFS storage volumes from Slurm jobs. Appears to be memory-related: initial advice is to increase memory allocation for job. Investigation underway with vendor, awaiting further advice.
Investigation is still ongoing. Mitigation is to run on the non-PFS storage, e.g. /work/scratch-nopw2 for non-MPI read/write operations.
CEDA and JASMIN Services will be unsupported on Monday 26th May due to the bank holiday. Responses to queries may take longer than usual this week.
